city.description: The city or locality within the address.

country.description: The country where the address is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code or ZIP code for the address.

province.description: The province or region within the country.

state.description: The state or administrative division within the country.

street_line1.description: The first line of the street address.

street_line2.description: The second line of the street address.

value.description: Represent value of alternative display value.

account_holder_name.description: The name of the account holder.

collection_type.description: The collection type for the bank details.

allowed_bins.description: An array of allowed BINs (6 or 8 digits) for credit card payments.

allow_full_payment.description: Indicate whether full payment (without installment) is allowed

allowed_terms.description: An object to set what kind (from specific bank / specific tenor) of cards installments will be available on a specific invoice

issuer.description: The bank code of the installment provider / issuer

terms.description: An array containing list of installment tenor available to choose

addresses.description: An array of addresses associated with the customer.

customer_id.description: An additional identifier for the customer.

given_names.description: The customer's given names or first names.

id.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

surname.description: The customer's surname or last name.

amount.description: The total amount of the invoice.

available_banks.description: An array of available banks for payment.

available_direct_debits.description: An array of available direct debit options for payment.

available_ewallets.description: An array of available e-wallets for payment.

available_paylaters.description: An array of available pay-later options for payment.

available_qr_codes.description: An array of available QR codes for payment.

available_retail_outlets.description: An array of available retail outlets for payment.

created.description: Representing a date and time in ISO 8601 format.

expiry_date.description: Representing a date and time in ISO 8601 format.

external_id.description: The external identifier for the invoice.

failure_redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to on payment failure.

fees.description: An array of fees associated with the invoice.

fixed_va.description: Indicates whether the virtual account is fixed.

id.description: The unique identifier for the invoice.

invoice_url.description: The URL to view the invoice.

items.description: An array of items included in the invoice.

locale.description: The locale or language used for the invoice.

merchant_profile_picture_url.description: The URL of the merchant's profile picture.

metadata.description: A free-format JSON for additional information that you may use. Object can be up to 50 keys, with key names up to 40 characters long and values up to 500 characters long.

payer_email.description: The email address of the payer.

reminder_date.description: Representing a date and time in ISO 8601 format.

should_authenticate_credit_card.description: Indicates whether credit card authentication is required.

should_exclude_credit_card.description: Indicates whether credit card payments should be excluded.

should_send_email.description: Indicates whether email notifications should be sent.

success_redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to on successful payment.

updated.description: Representing a date and time in ISO 8601 format.

user_id.description: The user ID associated with the invoice.

bank_code.description: The bank code for the bank details.

created.description: The date and time when the invoice was created.

credit_card_charge_id.description: The ID associated with a credit card charge (if applicable).

external_id.description: ID of your choice (typically the unique identifier of an invoice in your system)

failure_redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to on payment failure.

fees.description: An array of fees associated with the invoice.

id.description: An invoice ID generated by Xendit

merchant_name.description: The name of company or website

paid_amount.description: Total amount paid for the invoice

paid_at.description: The date and time when the invoice was paid.

payment_method.description: The payment method used for the invoice.

recurring_payment_id.description: The ID of the recurring payment.

should_authenticate_credit_card.description: Indicates whether credit card authentication is required.

success_redirect_url.description: The URL to redirect to on successful payment.

updated.description: The date and time when the invoice was last updated.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

url.description: The URL associated with the item.

value.description: The value or amount of the fee.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

reference_id.description: The reference ID of the item.

url.description: The URL associated with the item.

invoice_created.description: Notification channels for when an invoice is created.

invoice_paid.description: Notification channels for when an invoice is paid.

should_exclude.description: Indicates whether this paylater option should be excluded.

receipt_id.description: The unique identifier or reference ID associated with the payment receipt.

source.description: The source or method of payment.
